changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE gift_certificate ( id SERIAL NOT NULL, name VARCHAR(32) NOT NULL, description VARCHAR(64) NOT NULL, price DECIMAL(12,2) NOT NULL, duration INT NOT NULL, create_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL, last_update_date TIMESTAMP NULL, UNIQUE(name), PRIMARY KEY (id) );

changeSet.author: igor
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE gift_certificate_tag ( gift_certificate_id INT NOT NULL, tag_id INT NOT NULL, CONSTRAINT fk_gift_certificate_tag_id FOREIGN KEY (gift_certificate_id) REFERENCES gift_certificate (id) ON DELETE CASCADE, CONSTRAINT fk_tag_gift_certificate_id FOREIGN KEY (tag_id) REFERENCES tag (id), PRIMARY KEY (gift_certificate_id, tag_id) );
